p.d: Coming to you live on July 3rd, 2015 from Leszno, Poland at 8:15pm Central European Time, Mercedes-Benz Fraczak Boxing Night presents an unbelievable evening of combat sports action. In the main event Daniel Wanyonyi (21-7-2, 17KOs) of Kenya will face Poland's own Przemysław Opalach (17-2, 15KOs) for the vacant WBA Intercontinental Super Middleweight Championship. In addition to the incredible boxing action, there will also be numerous other fights under kickboxing, K1 and Full Contact rules featuring such top fighters as Janu Cruz, Michał Turynski, Yuri Dobko and more.
